ai-iti71:1.1_0: For this was said by the Buddha, the Perfected One: that is what I heard.
ai-iti71:2.1_0: “Mendicants, I’ve seen beings who engaged in good conduct of body, speech, and mind, who did not abuse the noble ones, who held right view and acted accordingly.
ai-iti71:2.2_0: At the breaking up of the body, after death, they were reborn in a good destination, a heaven world.
ai-iti71:3.1_0: Now, I don’t say this because I’ve heard it from some other ascetic or brahmin.
ai-iti71:3.2_0: I’ve seen beings who engaged in good conduct of body, speech, and mind, who did not abuse the noble ones, who held right view and acted accordingly.
ai-iti71:3.3_0: At the breaking up of the body, after death, they were reborn in a good destination, a heaven world.
ai-iti71:3.4_0: Rather, I say it because I’ve known, seen, and realized it for myself.
ai-iti71:4.1_0: I’ve seen beings who engaged in good conduct of body, speech, and mind, who did not abuse the noble ones, who held right view and acted accordingly.
ai-iti71:4.2_0: They spoke ill of the noble ones; they had wrong view; and they chose to act out of that wrong view.
ai-iti71:5.1_0: “When the mind has been directed right,
ai-iti71:5.3_0: and right bodily deeds have been done,
ai-iti71:5.4_0: for a person here who does the body.
ai-iti71:6.3_0: When their body breaks up, that wise person
ai-iti71:6.4_0: they’re reborn in a heavenly realm.”
ai-iti71:7.1_0: That is what the Buddha has heard.
